messages.content:
Hi. This is how it works:

The concept of giveaways is to help brand and bloggers gain real targeted followers who might be in the future potential clients and who will get to discover your brand and engage in your post.

We have worked with several bloggers who have gained 10K to 15K followers by participating in our last giveaways. They are satisfied since those followers are being responsive and are engaging, liking and commenting their posts.

We have a big list of sponsors who are big influencers and who are participating in our giveaways. Like said, they will post the giveaway on their pages and ask their followers who would love to participate to follow some people including you. 

Youâll have nothing to do. We require just a participation fee in order to pay our sponsors and the giveaway gift .
Payment? Sorry I've misunderstood I thought I was entering a giveaway not buying followers

Perfect. Happy to have you in the team ! 
Please send payment to thebloggersgiveaways@gmail.com via PayPal friends and family 
And include your Instagram handle in the notes ! 

Let us know when itâs done xx
Do you want to save your spot ?
If you donât get 2k followers at least you will then be offered a FREE spot for the next giveaway

Hey again 

We offer ghost spots meaning you are not required to post anything on your Instagram page for 120Â£.

We expect 2-5K followers at least. 

we have two spots left! 
Let me know if you want to join us!
